talk_text:
Before everyone realized it, Almaz's demon title
had evolved to become "Knock-off Overlord"!

Now, I'm asking you to join my great cause!
Join me, and half of this universe will be yours!

If you decline, then you'll die here!
I shall consume your flesh and blood!

I... I did it!
That was the first time I didn't stutter!
Well done, homes! You're marvelous, boss!

Great comeback! Boss!
That was awesome, weddo!
Haha, knock it off you guys... I'm kinda embarrassed, you know?
We don't have time for this!

Urgh... I had such a hard time spitting it out...
You guys are awful!

Obviously, you have no idea
how dreadful I can be!
Minions! Get them!

Almaz...
Why were you hunting Prinnies?
What are you up to?

Hehehe.
I'm not obligated to tell you the truth, but okay, I will do it before I kill you all!
I collected them to make a Prinny bomb!

A Prinny Bomb?
Like the one the Vato Brothers used before?

Nothing like that piddling excuse!
This will be the greatest and deadliest bomb ever, made from over 10000 Prinnies!

Are you telling me... you're using Prinnies
to make a bomb?

Exactly!
All Prinnies were once humans who sinned.
They are the embodiment of malice, hatred and resentment,

A mass of negative energy.
If we were to collect the souls of 10000 Prinnies, make them into a bomb and then detonate it...
This universe would be no more!
You're mad...!

Bark as you may!
There's nothing
you can do to stop me!

While Gordon and Almaz were talking, Almaz's title became 
"Quasi Overlord"!

Time is against us...
If our plan misfires, Almaz will become a true Overlord...

I won't let that happen!
Almaz!
Fight us!

The same old speech again?
Your attacks have no effect on me. 
Don't you understand that?

...Please. Almaz's hero title.
Please grant me your power!

The hero title in Sapphire's hands 
begins to shine brightly!
Wh-What is that light...?
C-Could it be...!
Our boss's lost hero title?!

That... warms me...
Love... hope... a hero's soul...
Noooooo!

BEEP BEEP BLIP BEEP...
ALMAZ'S NEGATIVE ENERGY HAS
GREATLY DECREASED.

Krgh...! Even so, I, Almaz, am an Overlord! And there's no way I can lose to you!
Yeah! Witness my true power!

Grrrgh... Why... 
I'm Almaz... I'm an Overlord...

Almaz's title is
about to become "Overlord"!

No! Princess Sapphire!
Hurry up and get your hero title...!

Almaz!
Come back to me!

Grraagghhhhh!
That light...
O-Oh... My Princess? Where am I...?
In the nick of time, Almaz regained his title "Hero"!

SAFETY CONFIRMED. THE NEGATIVE
ENERGY INSIDE ALMAZ HAS VANISHED.
Yay! We did it!
Almaz...

P-Princess...? I...??
Oh! My! What the hell have I done?!

Looks like he remembers everything he did when brainwashed...
This might leave him traumatized...
Almaz!

P-Princess! Are you gonna assume the Hell Spear stance...?!
Noooooo!
Please, forgive me!

Sapphire hugs Almaz
with all her might!
P-Princess...?

You are such a hopeless hero...!
Do you have the slightest idea... how worried I was about you?!
I'm so sorry... my Princess.

No, I'm not forgiving you!
Not even a Hell Spear could make up for what you've done!
You must stay with me for the rest of your life!

Promise me, you will never...
ever leave me again...
Almaz.

I... I promise!
I, Almaz, will always be by your side, protecting you, even if this costs my life!
Well. Thank you so much, Mr. Hero.
Good to know it's all settled.

Yeah...
We avoided the worst result
and didn't end up killing each other...

BEEP BEEP! NEGATIVE ENERGY
SEPARATED FROM ALMAZ
IS GATHERING!

Is that...?!
The demon title separated from Almaz...!
It's forming... an entity...?!
To be continued
Is that... a Prinny?
Let me explain what's happening here, ese!

The demon title that possessed you
has the same nature as that of the Prinny Bomb.
They came into being because of Prinnies' hatred and Baal's super Overlord power, homes!

And then Baal brainwashed our boss, weddo. 
But since the brainwashing has been lifted, the energy started to materialize, weddo!

That Prinny is formed
by the power possessed by that demon title.
If he is to have a title, then it'll be "Overlord Prinny"!

Yes! 
Thank you for your detailed explanation, as always!

We really should get away from here, ese!
He may appear weak as a Prinny, but don't forget he's an incarnation of negative energy, ese!

We're done with this, homes!
You guys should run away too, homes!

Give me... body... 
your... body...

If I've got it right, that separated demon title is
looking for a new host...

We're not cowards
who run away simply because
they're told to!

Well said, Gordon!
In the name of the Defenders of Earth, we can't let this grave threat go unchecked!

I used to be possessed by that title...
And now I'm gonna eliminate it with my own hands!

I don't care if he's an Overlord or not, that Prinny doesn't even end a sentence with "dood".
I'm not letting him get the better of me!

You are one to talk...
I mean, that "dood" problem...
Hmph... An Overlord as he may be, he's a Prinny after all.

BEEP BEEP BLIP BEEP...
VICTORY! VICTORY! VICTORY!
Thank you, Princess... and thank you, everyone.

Don't worry!
That's what a hero should do.

I'm sorry.
I tried to kill you guys...

Never mind. We're still alive.
If you really feed bad about it, then there is something you can do.
How can I make up for it...?

Almaz!
You can join us and fight as a hero!!

Of course. For peace in the world...
And on top of all that, I'm gonna break the nose of that Vulcanus for daring to harm my Princess!

Hahaha...!!!
That's the spirit!
We can do it. With so many heroes here, we'll not only break Vulcanus's nose, but kick that Tyrant Overlord Baal's ass, too!

At that moment!
A dream team of heroes was formed!
Anyway, I guess it's safe to say the Prinny case is over.

Please wait... Mr. Gordon.
The Prinny case is not
over yet.

What's up...?
Are there any loose ends?

It's about the Prinny Bomb...
They have gathered enough Prinnies
and are about to detonate the bomb.
That Prinny Bomb is complete already?

Yes. 
The other problem is...
They will explode in... less than one hour.
Wh...
Wh...
Wh...
Wh...
What the hell?!!
To be continued

Ha-Hahahaha!!
We are here, Etna, Flonne.
This is the MGS!

So, this is the biggest game fest in the Netherworld,
the "Makai Game Show"?

That's right! With the announcement of new games
and playable demos,
it's so great a place!

And you come to so great a place all by yourself every year!
It's unfair, Prince Laharl!

I thought you were not
into the game.
That's not true!

Like this,
"Clash! Prism Rangers Dodgeball",
I've been DREAMING to play it!
Sounds like crap to me.

Heh, you never know before you play.
That's the thrill of the unknown!
And the charm of MGS!

Well, why don't you guys go ahead and play your games?
And I will head to the food court
for some sweets!

Is that why you came along?
Whatever.
Now, let's see from which game we shall start our dominance!

In that case, we got a very,
very fun game here!
Hm, who are you?

Hi, hi You, over there!
It cannot be wrong!
You must be a very skilled player!

[Creator Asagi]
She appeared like a comet at MGS
with her motion-sensing game. 
Cheerful and energetic,
she got the best spot. 
In spite of that,
no one has played the game yet.
It seems as if she is waiting for someone.
So what's going on?

Please,
try my game!
I'm sure it's perfect for you!

So you are telling me that
a kid like yourself has made a game
that would satisfy me, the Overlord?

That's right.
This one!

A motion-sensing game
built on the latest full-dive VR system.
Its name is:
"Disgaea Wars (Tentative)"!

That's amazing!
A game made by
such a kid!

Motion-sensing huh? Sounds fun.
In that case, I'd like to try it too.
What do you say, Prince?

Full-dive VR system...
That's a big claim.
Now you got my attention.

This better to be good,
or I shall ban it by the authority of the Overlord!

Don't you worry about that!
You are going to love it,
I'm sure about that!

Then let us start...
Everyone, please put this on.

Put on these goggles,
and step in those pods over there,
and GAME START!
So, how do we clear the game?

Just beat the Overlord and GAME CLEAR.
Easy, right?
Then my power alone is more than enough.

Ah, you see, this demo here,
is a team mode.
You'll have to clear the game together
So says her, Prince.

So it's a friendship play, huh!
Now I'm totally turned on!

Now, GAME START!
Enjoy

...Are they in already?
Hehe
Success, success!

Now, time for work.
I'll do my best
So now we are in the game, huh.

Are you sure about that?
It doesn't feel much different
than the normal Netherworld.

Miss Etna, take a good look.
There, and over there!
There's something we've never seen.

Oh, yes, indeed.
A bunch of weird stuff.
And...

You mean that ugly building, right?
I would never grant permission to construct
such a thing in our real Netherworld!

Sure.
We're definitely in the game world!

Then let us defeat the Overlord
and restore the peace!

Heh.
Defeat me? You?
Who goes there!?

Do you not know me?
I am Asagi, the Doomsday Overlord.

[Overlord Asagi]
An evil Overlord ruling
the world of "Disgaea Wars (Tentative)".
She does anything to bring 
destruction, fear, and chaos.
A perfect example of evil Overlord.
People are scared of her,
but some are attracted to her bewitching appearance.
She has an underground fan club.

I felt a strong sense of magic and came here,
but turns out it's just a bunch of hicks.
Ahahaha! She called you hick, Prince.

Not just me,
and you as well!

Huh, so the clear condition
delivered herself to us.

Clear condition?
What hick nonsense is that?

Never mind.
This world belongs to me.
And you shall bow to me as well.

Absurd!
I am here
to defeat you.

Defeat me, the strongest Overlord?
You hicks are hilarious.

This world is already under my control.
And you, as well, are my belongings.

Try to defeat me
if you insist otherwise.

But first, you need to
prove yourself worthy.
I'll be waiting for you. Hicks.
And there she runs!

So she thinks we are not worthy to fight her yet.
Very well.
I shall definitely take her down!

How dare you make me, the Overlord,
to fight these small fries!
What a humiliation!
I am the strongest Overlord, even in the game world!

I shall defeat her, and reign
over the game world as the Overlord!

Oh please, Prince Laharl!
Laharl being Laharl,
even in the game world.

Well, in a way, he's the ideal player,
isn't he?

Shut up!
Let's go already.
Uh, excuse me.
Hm, who are you? Villager?

Are you here to thank us
for defeating the Overlord's minions?

What a kind villager.
Uhm, villager-chan, would you bring me
a whole lot of sweets as a thank-you gift?

No, no, I'm not a villager.
My name is Asagi, and I'm on an adventure
to defeat the Overlord Asagi.

[Heroine Agasi]
The Heroine of
"Disgaea Wars (Tentative)".
A cheerful and healthy girl
who fights to save the world. 
She has the same name of Asagi the Overlord,
but barely shares her appearance.
There is a noticeable difference, especially in the...
Oops, someone's coming.

I did not expect Overlord's minions
in such a remote area...

And I was surprised.
There are people other than me
who can defeat these minions of the Overlord.
Please join me if you...
Hey, you said Asagi, right?
Eh, yes. That's right.

I didn't notice it because you are totally flat,
but... Your face looks exactly like
the Overlord from earlier!

...What?!
Speaking of which, you got the same name!
Does that mean...!!

Are you that Overlord,
shapeshifted to trick us?

So that's the story.
You've come back to get on us,
I'll give you credit for that.

But that would be a shame.
Because I cannot be tricked!
H-Hey?!

So here we are. And you know what?
I shall defeat you where you stand
and clear the game!
Eeehhh...!?
*Sob*

Ha-Hahahaha!!
See? I said my power alone
is more than enough!

Now, it's time to enjoy this world
as we like it... huh?

We cleared the game,
but nothing's happening.

Um, Prince.
This Miss Asagi here,
might be a different person.

What! That's the same name as the Overlord!
Didn't you come to trick us
like Etna said!?

Oh, my dear Prince.
Who would trick someone else
with their real name?
Hey, you...
Are you all right, Miss Asagi?
Y-Yes.

You are all so very strong.
And I can't believe you're not afraid to look at me.

Why should I be afraid
to look at you?

Because I have the same name as the Overlord,
and I look like her somehow.
I am frightened and avoided for that...
We're not going to do that.
And our goal is to defeat Asagi the Overlord.

Are you guys on an adventure
to defeat the Overlord?

And, that power that defeated me
and the Overlord's minions...

Could it be, that you are the
"Chosen Ones" that I've been searching for?!

What exactly
is this Chosen One?
It's a legend of this world.

"When the world is enveloped by evil,
the Creator's chosen ones will emerge
to banish the darkness and bring peace."
You mean that's us?
So what does that mean, Prince?

Perhaps that's the role
we were given
when we came here.

Oh, I see.
This is a game after all.
P-pardon...?

Oh, sorry, it's something between us,
so please don't mind it.
Huh, okay.

So, Miss Asagi, are you
fighting the Overlord Asagi all by yourself?

Yes.
This world is ruled by the Overlord,
and everyone is too afraid to fight.

That's why I want to defeat her
to bring back peace
and everyone's smile!

To bring back peace and everyone's smile,
that's exactly what a hero does!
Please, let me help!
You are willing to fight on my side!?

Of course!
You can count on us!
Hey, you don't get to decide on that.

My power alone is more than enough for this petty Overlord Asagi.
Just leave her and let's...
Heroine Asagi has joined the party.
Huh, what the hell was that?

That must be Miss Asagi
officially becoming
one of us!

Prince, Prince. That's what that girl said:
We'll have to clear this game together.

Perhaps
that includes this Asagi
as well?

What!?
She did not say it that way!
That was not a proper instruction!

Then it's settled!
Nice to meet you, Miss Asagi!
Thank you!

I was on the journey to defeat the Overlord,
but my journey was also a search
for the Chosen Ones.

One of the objectives has been achieved.
Now we just need to get to the Overlord's castle!

Asagi,
what were you going to do
if you couldn't find us?

Well, that...
Training and becoming stronger...
Typical.

Don't you have any friends
other than us?
No...

I have the same name as the Overlord,
and we look a bit alike.
Everybody thinks I'm on her side.
So I've been fighting alone all the time.

Don't the people of this world
want to fight the Overlord Asagi?

The Overlord has a powerful artifact
called the "Ring of Pledge".

She's been using its power
to wreak havoc in this world,
and no one could stand in her way.
So everyone is scared...
Then why do you stand up and fight?

I cannot let her...
No, fighting is
the least I can do!

I know how to fight.
So as long as it helps anyone,
I will fight for everyone.

You are so kind, Miss Asagi!
Rest assured!
You have us now!
I will!
Wait.
Yes?
Asagi, fight me.

Eehh!? Again!?
Don't you understand that I'm not your enemy?

Yes
However, if you are to join us
and defeat the Overlord Asagi...

You'll need training.
We don't need someone to slow us down.
Ah, I see...

I won't go easy on you.
Prepare yourself!

This is it!
Asagi, onward!
Well, I guess that's it for now.

Huh...Huh...
Thank you very much, Mr. Laharl!

You surprised me when
you suddenly fight Miss Asagi, Prince Laharl.

Our mission is to defeat the Overlord
and clear the game.

Since Asagi joined our party,
she must be important.
As in a game.

I do not have the time
for her to grind on small fry.
I see. So that's how it is.

But compared to the Prince,
you will get leveled even more if you fought me instead.
Nonsense!

THANK YOU.
You are so kind, Mr. Laharl!

Kind!?
I am NOT kind!

I had to fight you because
you are not allowed to remain weak!

Hehe, then we will take it
that way.

You, too!
Enough of that! I'm going already!
Prince Laharl, please wait!
Do you know the way, Prince?
Hey, Asagi, are you sure this is the right way?

Hey, Asagi!
Asagi-chan, are you listening?

So-Sorry!
Balsamic vinegar is on its way!
Whoa, whoa, whoa, that doesn't make any sense.

What is it,
Are you feeling unwell?

N-No, that's not the case...
I'm just getting a bit nervous at the thought
that we are getting close to the Overlord's castle.

Don't you worry!
I can crush that kind of
Overlord singlehandedly.

C-could we by any chance
defeat her with persuasion?

What are you talking about?
You're going to defeat the Overlord Asagi
in order to save this world, are you not?

I am. But...
That would be the last resort...

Looks like you have your reasons.
Would you talk about it?

...Actually, the Overlord Asagi and I
have known each other since we were young.
What!?

We were from the same kingdom,
had the same name and looked alike.
We were kind of popular in the kingdom.

I was a humble villager,
but at the invitation of the Overlord Asagi, daughter of a nobleman,
I was able to participate in various events.

But once upon a time, I took part in a tournament
for the prize money...

In the finals, I faced the Overlord Asagi
for the first time. And...
And you won.

A mere village girl managed to
beat the daughter of a nobleman,
that was a great fun for the audience. But...
Not fun for the Overlord Asagi.

After that, she challenged
me over and over, but I won
every single time...
You could have lost on purpose.

She'd know if
I did go easy on her.
And she'd be mad as hell...

Then one day, the Overlord Asagi
came to me saying
she heard a rumor.
About a cave where the Ring of Pledge was sealed in.

The Ring of Pledge, right?
You went for that?

Yes.
It was a very dangerous place,
so I tried to talk her out of it.

But the Overlord Asagi insisted
that it would be a competition, and went on for it.

Speaking of which, you did mention
that she was empowered by the Ring of Pledge.

So, Miss Overlord Asagi
got the ring?

Yes.
The ring had fearsome power in it.

And by putting that ring on,
she turned evil,
into the Overlord Asagi.

She said she was going to do what I couldn't
and prove that she was stronger
and better than me.
How terrible...

And that was when
I heard about the legend of Chosen Ones.

I wondered if I can restore the Overlord Asagi
with the help of the Chosen Ones.

But we do not have such power
to bring an Overlord
back to normal, right?

No, we don't.
It would be a lot easier to just beat her.

No, wait...!?
Still, I must...
It's all right!
Miss Flonne?

You have us now!
Miss Asagi, we will make you the chance you need
to talk to Miss Overlord Asagi!
And you will do the persuasion.
I will!

If persuasion was to work,
I don't think we'd
be in this mess.

Oh please, Prince Laharl!
That's not true!

We should help Miss Asagi
with her warm persuasion.
And it will work for sure!

That must be the reason
of Miss Asagi joining our party!

I don't believe such nonsense,
but we share the same goal of defeating the Overlord.

Let's see if you can persuade the Overlord
before I beat her!
Prince Laharl....

Great!
I'm not going to lose!

Miss Etna, Miss Flonne,
I have a request.
Yes, what is it?
Please fight me!
That's abrupt.
What's the fight for?

I was hoping
you guys could make the chance so
I can persuade the Overlord Asagi.

But, she became what she is now because of me.
If she attacks me,
I'd like to take it with my body.
And then persuade her after that.

Yet I am not strong enough for that.
So I want to fight you both and gain strength,
just like I did with Mr. Laharl!

Wonderful!
That's the spirit!
Now, Miss Etna?

Eh, boring...
I want to go to that village
and see if there are rare sweets there.
S-sweets...?

If that's the case,
I'll just break into someone's house
and loot some items for you!

Eh!?
Please don't.
You cannot just break into someone's house!

You two, we'll get to that later!
We should focus on Miss Asagi's request right now!

Alright, alright.
I'll do it.

A little exercise would
make the sweets taste better.

Here I come, Asagi!
Prepare yourself!
P-please be gentle with me...!
Thank you, both of you!

No problem!
I'm glad I could be of help,
Miss Asagi!

Are you done?
Let's go already.

Prince, where are you going
in such a hurry?
The town over there of course!

The best part of being a game player
is breaking in houses
and searching for items.

And experiencing that in person?
You don't get that chance every day!

I'm gonna see if there are any healing items
in the bathroom!
Ha-Hahahaha!!

Just demons
being demons.

I've had my exercise.
Time for some sweets!

And I won't get fat since it's just a game.
I'll have as much as I want!
Uh, Mr. Laharl! Miss Etna!
They are gone, Miss Flonne.
...Miss Flonne?

Miss Asagi, are we close to
the Overlord Asagi's castle?

Y-yes!
The castle is right past that town.

In other words, this is the town right before the last boss.
...which means, there might be a hidden quest
to get you the most powerful weapon!

I'm gonna talk with
every single townsfolk!
Miss Flonne too!?

Ahaha... Why,
why am I starting to worry now.

We are here.
The Overlord Asagi's castle.
Ahhh, I wish I had more cake...

Then, I got this tiramisu I found
in the bathroom of a nobleman's house.

It must be a healing item.
I don't need it, so do you want some?
I definitely don't want that!

Still, it's magnificent
to look at up close like this.

It's ugly to me, but I like how big it is.
I'll take it as my stronghold
after I defeat the Overlord Asagi.

Uh, Prince!
I want a room
with a Jacuzzi, please!

Please, everyone!
Please focus!

From here on out, the Overlord Asagi's minions
will definitely be getting stronger!
We must be on our guard!

Bah. No matter how strong the small fry becomes,
they are no match for me.
Let's go.
It's a big place.
Perhaps this is the Overlord Asagi's room.
But, no sign of her.

Overlord Asagi!
It's me, Asagi!
Where are you!

You have arrived, at last.
The one who shares my name.
Hmm? You three. The hicks from last time?

You still call me a hick!
I shall destroy you before they persuade you!
Prince Laharl, please calm down.

Asagi, why are you not alone?
Don't you tell me these are your friends!

That's right.
Mr. Laharl and the party,
are the Chosen Ones.

They are my reliable companions
who will help me to fight you!

You say companions!?
Eh, I feel sick about that word...

Well, well, Prince.
We are now a party,
so live with it.

No way! I've wreaked havoc all over the world,
plunging the inhabitants into fear, and chaos,
making them afraid of you.
Yet you got companions...!!
Afraid of me? What's that for?

What did you mean by
"making them afraid of me"?

With my tyranny,
people will think that you, with the same name, are related to me,
and they will become uneasy.

In other words,
people would fear you and isolate you.
Just as you said, Asagi.

So, Miss Overlord Asagi,
you've been rampaging the world
just in order to isolate Miss Asagi!?

That's right.
In the past, I was never able
to defeat the Asagi there.

I should have won
in terms of family, talent, and everything.

I had all of them and you had none!
How could you have beaten me!

Besides the name, what's the difference between you and me?
I cannot allow that!

I shall defeat you with overwhelming power
after isolating you.

Then I shall reign
as the strongest Overlord!

Terrifying everyone
just to isolate me,
that is too far...!

I had everything!
Until you showed up!

Since the day you defeated me,
all I had in my life was but misery.

And yet, you've always treated me with a smile,
unaware of my feelings.

That attitude of yours is disgusting.
This time, I shall win!
The strongest Asagi is me!
So it's not about the strongest Overlord, but the strongest Asagi?

It's good for demons to be dirty like that,
but don't involve us into
your personal animosities!

Well, the mission is designed like that,
so stop complaining.
Fine!

Show me your full power and determination
if you want to be the strongest Overlord!
Prince Laharl....
W-what do you hicks know about me!

You call me a hick again?
This will be the last time.

I'll make you regret your continued insults to me,
Laharl the Overlord!
Let's go, Asagi!
O-Okay!

...No way,
so great power...

Am I doomed to be
overtaken by you?
I'm not overtaking you.

I just enjoyed our
fighting and competition.
You enjoyed those?

Because your status was so much higher than mine,
yet I was able to play with you as equals, right?

Each and every moment, whatever it may be. Like when we competed to see
who would make a flower crown faster.
It was always fun to be together.

You even competed for that?
That's what friends do.
That's lovely.

Every day, I looked forward to seeing you
and thought about how we would have fun together.
I thought we were best friends.

Best, friends...?
You and me?

You have changed since you put on that Ring of Pledge.
